entries.meaning: A telephone line that is always staffed and able to give immediate assistance.
examples: If you've got any problems with the product, ring our hotline.

entries.meaning: A direct line between two people, especially one between heads of state to be used in an emergency.

verbs.description: hotline (third-person singular simple present hotlines, present participle hotlining, simple past and past participle hotlined)

entries.meaning: To communicate over a telephone hotline.
